long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage and share your web bookmarks with tall.ly

tall.ly is a web service that allows you to save and categorise meaningful web links through a web interface. Each list of bookmarks you prepare can then be made public and shared with anyone without the need for them to create an account.

This extension provides you with the quickest way to add a bookmark to any of your lists created on tall.ly
